languages.text: "Леди Сюэ, глава отряда инквизиторов, не удостоила нас полным отчетом, так как спешно готовится к экспедиции в сердце аномалии. Но она туманно утверждает, что мы "стали свидетелями древней междоусобицы ксеносов, и как бы чужда она нам ни была, важно верно выбрать союзника в этой битве"... Что бы это ни значило".

"The leader of the Inquisition squad, Lady Xue, did not grace us with a full report since she has been hastily preparing for the expedition into the heart of the anomaly. But she mysteriously claims that 'we have become witnesses to an ancient feud between xenos, and, in spite of our unfamiliarity with their conflict, it is important to choose our ally in this struggle wisely'... Whatever that means."
languages.original_text: "Леди Сюэ, глава отряда инквизиторов, не удостоила нас полным отчетом, так как спешно готовится к экспедиции в сердце аномалии. Но она туманно утверждает, что мы "стали свидетелями древней междоусобицы ксеносов, и как бы чужда она нам ни была, важно верно выбрать союзника в этой битве"... Что бы это ни значило".

traits.locale_text: "The leader of the Inquisitor squad, Lady Xue, did not grace us with the full report, since she has been in a rush preparing for the expedition inside the heart of the anomaly. But she mysteriously claims that 'We have become the witnesses of the ancient strife between the xenos, and in spite of their conflict being foreign to us, it is important to choose our ally in this struggle wisely'... Whatever that means."

Whatever that means."

languages.text: “审判庭小队的队长薛女士一直在忙于准备探索异常地带，因此并没有发给我们完整的报告，但她以神秘的语气说了这样的话。‘我们正在见证异形之间的旧恨。尽管我们并不熟悉他们之间的纷争，但在这场斗争中，明智地选择盟友至关重要。’……不知道这是什么意思。”
languages.original_text: "The leader of the Inquisition squad, Lady Xue, did not grace us with a full report since she has been hastily preparing for the expedition into the heart of the anomaly. But she mysteriously claims that 'we have become witnesses to an ancient feud between xenos, and, in spite of our unfamiliarity with their conflict, it is important to choose our ally in this struggle wisely'... Whatever that means."

traits.locale_text: “审判庭小队的队长薛女士一直在忙于准备探索异常地带，因此并没有发给我们完整的报告，但她以神秘的语气说了这样的话。‘我们正在见证异形之间的旧恨。尽管我们并不熟悉他们之间的纷争，但在这场斗争中，明智地选择盟友至关重要。’……不知道这是什么意思。”
“审判庭小队的队长薛女士一直在忙于准备探索异常地带，因此并没有发给我们完整的报告，但她以神秘的语气说了这样的话。‘我们正在见证异形之间的古老冲突。尽管我们并不熟悉他们之间的纷争，但在这场斗争中，明智地选择盟友至关重要。’……不知道这是什么意思。”

languages.text: «La líder del escuadrón de la Inquisición, lady Xue, no nos honró con un informe completo, ya que se ha estado preparando a toda prisa para la expedición al corazón de la anomalía. Pero afirma con tono misterioso que "nos hemos convertido en testigos de un antiguo enfrentamiento entre xenos, y, a pesar de nuestra ignorancia sobre su conflicto, es importante elegir sabiamente a nuestros aliados en esta lucha"... No termino de entender su mensaje».
languages.original_text: "The leader of the Inquisition squad, Lady Xue, did not grace us with a full report since she has been hastily preparing for the expedition into the heart of the anomaly. But she mysteriously claims that 'we have become witnesses to an ancient feud between xenos, and, in spite of our unfamiliarity with their conflict, it is important to choose our ally in this struggle wisely'... Whatever that means."

traits.locale_text: «La líder del escuadrón de la Inquisición, lady Xue, no nos honró con un informe completo, ya que se ha estado preparando a toda prisa para la expedición al corazón de la anomalía. Pero afirma con tono misterioso que "nos hemos convertido en testigos de un antiguo enfrentamiento entre xenos, y, a pesar de nuestra ignorancia sobre su conflicto, es importante elegir sabiamente a nuestros aliados en esta lucha"... No termino de entender su mensaje».

languages.text: 「異端審問官の部隊のリーダーであるレディ・シュエは、アノマリーの中心部への遠征の準備を急いでいるため、詳しくは報告してくれませんでした。しかし、彼女は '私たちはゼノ同士の古代の衝突の目撃者になった。奴らの争いはよく分からないが、この闘争でどちら側と手を組むのかを賢明に選択することが重要だ 'と、何を意味するのかは別として、意味深なことを言っています」
languages.original_text: "The leader of the Inquisition squad, Lady Xue, did not grace us with a full report since she has been hastily preparing for the expedition into the heart of the anomaly. But she mysteriously claims that 'we have become witnesses to an ancient feud between xenos, and, in spite of our unfamiliarity with their conflict, it is important to choose our ally in this struggle wisely'... Whatever that means."

traits.locale_text: 「異端審問官の部隊のリーダーであるレディ・シュエは、アノマリーの中心部への遠征の準備を急いでいるため、詳しくは報告してくれませんでした。しかし、彼女は '私たちはゼノ同士の古代の衝突の目撃者になった。奴らの争いはよく分からないが、この闘争でどちら側と手を組むのかを賢明に選択することが重要だ 'と、何を意味するのかは別として、意味深なことを言っています」
「異端審問官の部隊のリーダーであるレディ・シュエは、アノマリーの中心部への遠征の準備を急いでいるため、詳しくは報告してくれませんでした。しかし、彼女は '私たちはゼノ同士の古代の衝突の目撃者になった。奴らの争いはよく分からないが、この闘争でどちら側と手を組むのかを賢明に選択することが重要だ 'と、何を意味するのかは別として、意味深なことを言っています」

languages.text: « La commandante de l'escouade de l'Inquisition, dame Xue, n'a pas daigné nous transmettre de rapport complet depuis qu'elle se prépare à envoyer au plus vite une expédition au cœur de l'anomalie. Elle a tout de même fait cette déclaration mystérieuse : "Nous sommes les témoins d'un conflit ancien entre xénos, et malgré notre méconnaissance de ses enjeux, nous devons prendre judicieusement parti"... C'est on ne peut plus obscur. »
languages.original_text: "The leader of the Inquisition squad, Lady Xue, did not grace us with a full report since she has been hastily preparing for the expedition into the heart of the anomaly. But she mysteriously claims that 'we have become witnesses to an ancient feud between xenos, and, in spite of our unfamiliarity with their conflict, it is important to choose our ally in this struggle wisely'... Whatever that means."

traits.locale_text: « La commandante de l'escouade de l'Inquisition, dame Xue, n'a pas daigné nous transmettre de rapport complet depuis qu'elle se prépare à envoyer au plus vite une expédition au cœur de l'anomalie. Elle a tout de même fait cette déclaration mystérieuse : "Nous sommes les témoins d'un conflit ancien entre xénos, et malgré notre méconnaissance de ses enjeux, nous devons prendre judicieusement parti"... C'est on ne peut plus obscur. »

languages.text: "Die Anführerin der Inquisition, Lady Xue, hat uns noch keinen vollständigen Bericht erstattet, da sie mit hektischen Vorbereitungen für die Expedition ins Herz der Anomalie beschäftigt ist. Sie behauptet allerdings, 'Wir wären Zeugen eines uralten Kampfes zwischen Xenos geworden, und obschon wir mit ihrem Konflikt nicht vertraut sind, ist es wichtig, unseren Verbündeten in diesem Kampf weise zu wählen' ... Was immer das heißen mag."
languages.original_text: "The leader of the Inquisition squad, Lady Xue, did not grace us with a full report since she has been hastily preparing for the expedition into the heart of the anomaly. But she mysteriously claims that 'we have become witnesses to an ancient feud between xenos, and, in spite of our unfamiliarity with their conflict, it is important to choose our ally in this struggle wisely'... Whatever that means."

traits.locale_text: "Die Anführerin der Inquisition, Lady Xue, hat uns noch keinen vollständigen Bericht erstattet, da sie mit hektischen Vorbereitungen für die Expedition ins Herz der Anomalie beschäftigt ist. Sie behauptet allerdings, 'Wir wären Zeugen eines uralten Kampfes zwischen Xenos geworden, und obschon wir mit ihrem Konflikt nicht vertraut sind, ist es wichtig, unseren Verbündeten in diesem Kampf weise zu wählen' ... Was immer das heißen mag."

"Die Anführerin der Inquisitoren, Lady Xue, hat uns noch keinen vollständigen Bericht erstattet, da sie mit hektischen Vorbereitungen für die Expedition ins Herz der Anomalie beschäftigt ist. Sie hat jedoch etwas Merkwürdiges gesagt: 'Wir sind Zeugen eines uralten Kampfs zwischen Xenos geworden, und auch wenn wir mit ihrem Konflikt nicht vertraut sind, ist es wichtig, unseren Verbündeten in diesem Kampf weise zu wählen' ... Was auch immer das bedeutet."

languages.text: "Engizisyon mangasının lideri Leydi Xue, bize detaylı bir rapor bahşetmedi. Anomalinin merkezine doğru yapacağı keşif için alelacele hazırlandığından olsa gerek. Ancak esrarengiz bir şekilde 'Zenolar arasındaki kadim bir kan davasının tanıkları olduk. Anlaşmazlıklarına aşina olmasak da bu çekişmede müttefikimizi akıllıca seçmemiz önem taşıyor.' gibi bir iddiada bulundu. Bu ne demekse..."
languages.original_text: "The leader of the Inquisition squad, Lady Xue, did not grace us with a full report since she has been hastily preparing for the expedition into the heart of the anomaly. But she mysteriously claims that 'we have become witnesses to an ancient feud between xenos, and, in spite of our unfamiliarity with their conflict, it is important to choose our ally in this struggle wisely'... Whatever that means."

Ancak esrarengiz bir şekilde 'Zenolar arasındaki kadim bir kan davasının tanıkları olduk. Anlaşmazlıklarına aşina olmasak da bu çekişmede müttefikimizi akıllıca seçmemiz önem taşıyor.' gibi bir iddiada bulundu. Bu ne demekse..."
